> Hmmm, I found what I thought was your reply to someone while searching the
> arhive for "Parameterized Test Case", but I did not go far enough. I guess
> the stuff you were referring to starts around:
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/9954

This is what I mean. No inner classes.

> I did notice that the setup and teardown were not called before and after
> the inner tests were run :(

Sure they are. Overriding runTest() doesn't affect whether runBare() 
invokes setUp() and tearDown(). It's just that with PTC you generally 
don't need them.

> Thanks for contibuting your work on the subject.

You're welcome.
